page.title: 09TRANSPORT.
page.content: The{docks}are located to the west of our block.They stretch from{Seaforth to{Dingle.}The{docks}which are located within our area include;{Gladstone, {Hornby and Alexandra Docks.}Over the past thirty years there have been many changes in the{dockland}area of {Bootle.}The{docks}began to decline, factories closed, warehouses became empty.Many of these buildings were knocked down.If you walk around the streets, you can see large areas of derelict land which is no longer used.{Unemployment}in the area has increased because people lost their jobs and factories closed down. However,the{docks}are now growing in importance again and there are new {industries}coming to the area.The area has become a{Freeport}and there is now a containerbase,a grain terminal and a large scrap metal trade.{(James Evans)
